txt.en: Every day there is something to do in the Harvest Festival, both at the Party Tree, in Wistmead, and for Treats and Trickery.  Join in the autumnal activities for five more days!
Every day there is something to do in the Harvest Festival, both at the Party Tree, in Wistmead, and for Treats and Trickery.  Join in the autumnal activities for five more days!
Every day there is something to do in the Harvest Festival, both at the Party Tree, in Wistmead, and for Treats and Trickery.  Join in the autumnal activities for five more days!

'Is the Harvest Festival almost over? Well, we have certainly had our fill, you and I. To be entirely honest, I think I am ready for a brief rest. After all, Yule is hardly around the corner!\n\n'Jests aside, I thank you for joining me. You have made this year's Harvest all the richer by your joining in, I assure you, [placeholder].'

'I say, there is so much fun to be had around here, isn't there? Not to mention by the Party Tree! I could go about from the first day until the very last and not get my fill of Haunted Burroughs, Hedge Mazes, and Treats or Trickery!

'You feel the same, do you not, [placeholder]? Well, do not be shy! Seize the season. Persistent effort reaps rich rewards, as I like to say.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: this quest cannot be cancelled.</rgb>

There is much to do during the Harvest Festival! Participate often to earn wonderful gifts!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>(There are twenty days worth of  Bountiful Harvest and Spirited Harvest participation quests. Plan accordingly!)</rgb>

'Is the Harvest Festival almost over? Well, we have certainly had our fill, you and I. To be entirely honest, I think I am ready for a brief rest. After all, Yule is hardly around the corner!\n\n'Jests aside, I thank you for joining me. You have made this year's Harvest all the richer by your joining in, I assure you, [placeholder].'

'I say, there is so much fun to be had around here, isn't there? I could go about from the first day until the very last and not get my fill of Haunted Burrows, Hedge Mazes, and Treats or Trickery!

'You feel the same, do you not, [placeholder]? Well, do not be shy! Seize the season. Persistent effort reaps rich rewards, as I like to say.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: this quest cannot be cancelled.</rgb>
Every day there is something to do in the Harvest Festival, both at the Party Tree, in Wistmead, and for Treats and Trickery.  Join in the autumnal activities to receive gifts!
You should return to Rosa Hornblower, who can be found near the Party Tree and in Wistmead.
